title: Mafalda 12
description: Latin-Americas best selling cartoon ever! Originally published between 1964-1973, these strips show very sharp criticism of a fast changing world by a very adult six-year old. Laughter and reason go hand in hand, in this series thats been translated to over 15 languages, and most of its message and humor remains as accurate and entertaining as it was thirty years ago.
author: Quino
